name: The Snail DX
description:
The Snail DX - A Game Boy Color Style Rogue-lite

You are an adventurer searching for treasure in a deep cave, but your greed will not go unpunished. As you try to escape with your treasure you will have to avoid traps, find keys to ascend, buy items to assist your navigation, and avoid the mysterious snail! Can you make it out alive in this Game Boy Color style rogue-lite?

This DX version of the original game "The Snail" features many upgrades and improvements! These improvements include:

- Fully coloured sprites and backgrounds that change as you progress

- The Snail now gets faster as you ascend, making the difficulty increase slightly in each run

- New upgrade system where you can purchase items using the coins you collect from the cursed merchant

- 8 trophies (achievements) to collect!

The Snail DX also retains the features from the previous version:

-High Score System

-Randomly Generated Levels

-Unlockable Endless mode

-Multiple Endings

-Original art and music

I am a solo game dev making Game Boy styled games as a hobby. This game was made in GB Studio by Chris Maltby. The Snail and The Snail DX were projects I made to test how random generation could work in GB Studio. 

Controls for browser:

A = Z

B = X

D-PAD = Arrow Keys

START = ENTER

SELECT = SHIFT

Thank you for playing the game! I hope you enjoy it, and I would appreciate any comments or feedback!
